Define a link to a support page for this portal; it will appear as a help icon in the CommSy navigation bar
This support email will appear on a workspace's home page if no own support form has been defined below

Define a link to your own support form; it will appear on a workspace's home page instead of the support email. Available variables:

%FIRSTNAME% = firstname
%LASTNAME% = lastname
%EMAIL% = email address
%USERID% = account
%PORTAL% = name of the portal
%TITLE% = name of the current workspace

Enable time pulses if you want to associate project workspaces with certain divisions of a year (like a semester or trimester). The options below allow you to specify the name used for time pulses in the user interface, and how many time pulses shall be created from the templates defined below:

Placeholders for 4-digit years:
%1 = current year
%2 = next year
%3 = last year

Placeholders for 2-digit years:
%4 = current year
%5 = next year
%6 = last year
